name: fit-mark
description:
Hi, 

in the game you have to catch blocks. Then you separate them into different boxes. If you don't catch it, it's over.  

Controls mouse and touch blue button.  

If you prefer a keyboard:

  • left or the a key - controls left 
  • right or the d key - controls right  
  • space kay - drops  

 Have fun and thanks for the feedback

https://liluo.io/afnwork/fit-mark
